page.title: 02HOME LIFE IN BRUNNION
page.content: { Mrs Croucher}lives in a small hamlet of{Brunnion}which consists of six dwellings.She is happy with her life mainly because of the solitude provided by the area. The{power}in her house comes to the property from{overhead cables}and constantly breaks down in winter.She is changing her heating from{oil and {wood}burning back to{coal}because the latter is cheaper. Her house was originally owned by a farmer and used for rearing young calves.It was sold by the farmer and another low building added to form an {attractive bungalow}together with three acres of grass which is cut by the farmer for hay. { }Mrs Croucher has a{car}which she regards as essential as there are no shops or{public transport}within walking distance of her home.
